nodes.text: Narp Pilyev was a man who worked as a bureaucrat for the Galactic Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Pilyev lived in an apartment on the planet Coruscant and owned two IG-100 MagnaGuards, which he used as security guards. He stole some valuable Imperial Navy documents and attempted to sell them to the Hutt crime lord Draba, telling her that he would offer them to another buyer if she didn't match his price within five days. However, Draba instead hired some agents to break into Pilyev's apartment and steal the documents.
